name: Space Rush (Mr_McGlass)
description:
This is my entry for the Brackeys Game Jam.

My interpretation of the theme (let there be chaos) was to make the game quick and simple to understand yet quite difficult.

Some of you have been wondering why there is no sound, and its because I am not that smart and don’t know how to default it to on, but right now, it is turned off, you can change the volume in the SETTINGS menu.

This is actually my FIRST GAME EVER!!!!! So hope you enjoy, please give me some feed back, I would very much appreciate it!

Hope you enjoy my game!!!

I am also going to try make it into a mobile game that you can download on the google play store. I am just saying that, if anyone is interested

__Credits__

GUI Stuff: https://craftpix.net/freebies/free-space-shooter-game-gui/

In game asteroids and health: https://craftpix.net/freebies/free-space-shooter-game-objects/

Backgrounds: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/dynamic-space-backgr...

Planets: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/planets-with-space-b...

Craftpix Store: https://craftpix.net/

Unity Asset Store: https://assetstore.unity.com/
